data.sampled:
The statements in the passage are about a law called "The Benami Transactions (Prohibition) Act, 1988" (hereinafter referred to as PBPT Act). Let's consider these statements one by one and analyze their accuracy:

1. Correct Statement: This statement means that if any transaction of property is done without disclosing its real owner or the name on which it was purchased, then such a purchase will not be considered benami. If the actual owner of the asset has knowledge of the deal, the transaction may still be deemed genuine.
2. Incorrect Statement: While this act allows seizure of benami properties from individuals who have received them under this arrangement, there is no mention of transferring ownership of such assets to government agencies.
3. Correct Statement: The act provides for three authorities responsible for implementing the legislation - Income Tax Authorities, Assessing Officer, and Administrator. However, they do not fall within the ambit of any judicial proceedings.

Out of the given options, option (c) correctly states that both statement 1 and 3 are accurate.

2. ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों और सिन्धु घाटी के लोगों की संस्कृति के बीच अंतर के संबंध में, निम्नलिखित कथनों में से कौन-सा/से सही है/हैं?

2- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों को स्वर्ण, चाँदी और ताम्र का ज्ञान था जबकि सिन्धु घाटी के लोगों को कवल ताम्र और लोह का ज्ञान था।
3- ऋग्वेद-कालीन आर्यों ने घोड़े को पालतू बना लिया था जबकि इस बात का कोई साक्ष्य नहीं है कि सिन्धु घाअी के लोग इस पशु को जानते थे।
